body_html:
Hi @jjsjann123,

As a followup, would you please add separate unit tests for convert_nodes.cc and convert_graph.cc? These files are becoming enormous (especially convert_nodes.cc) and it will be very hard to maintain and debug without a test.

Thanks.

body:
Hi @jjsjann123,

As a followup, would you please add separate unit tests for convert_nodes.cc and convert_graph.cc? These files are becoming enormous (especially convert_nodes.cc) and it will be very hard to maintain and debug without a test.

Thanks.
